feature1.explanation: Both texts use ellipses (...) and double ellipsis (....) indicating a similar style of punctuation.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical/grammatical features, sentence structure, discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the texts were written by the same author.
